General.Name: Thiogenesis Therapeutics Corp.
General.Description: Thiogenesis Therapeutics, Corp., a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company, develops thiol-active therapeutic compounds to treat unmet medical needs. Its lead product candidate under development is TTI-0102, a prodrug consisting of cysteamine for use in the treatment of mitochondrial encephalopathy lactic acidosis and stroke, Rett syndrome, and pediatric non-alcoholic fatty liver diseases. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 4 King Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 1B6
